A

average(int...) - Static method in class com.android.Main
this returns an optional variable, which may or may not have a value.

C

com.android - package com.android
 

D

dblOpt - Static variable in class com.android.Main
this is a optional that has a data type of Double, so if this optional has a value, it will be an Integer

E

ex1() - Static method in class com.android.Examples
 
Examples - Class in com.android
 
Examples() - Constructor for class com.android.Examples
 

I

intOpt - Static variable in class com.android.Main
this is a optional that has a data type of Integer, so if this Optional has a value it will be a Integer

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.android.Main
you can't assign a value directly to a an optional you can use the static method of() of the optional class to give a value to a Optional variable intOpt is a Optional of data type Integer, so you can only assign Integers to it intOpt=Optional.of(12); if you wish to use optional as a number then you use the get() method of the Optional class intOpt.get() other methods to use are isPresent(), which returns a boolean, true if there is a value, false if not orElse(), which will give a default value even if the optional has no value i.e intOpt.orElseGet(23)//if intOpt has no value will give a value of 23 orElseGet() which takes a Supplier, so a call to this method could look like intOpt.orElseGet(()->(int)(Math.random()*100)
Main - Class in com.android
class that contains the main method, which will be used to call the Code that deals with the Optional type in java 8 you can have a OPTIONAL type, which is a data type.
Main() - Constructor for class com.android.Main
 

O

opt - Static variable in class com.android.Main
this is a Optional that is given no data type, so if this optional has a value it will be an object (so if you assign a string to this optional, you will have a Object reference to a String object

S

strOpt - Static variable in class com.android.Main
this is an Optional of type String, so if this Optional has a value it will be a String
